TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CngKey extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class CngKey Implements IDisposable
public ref class CngKey sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 定义用于下一代加密技术 (CNG) 对象的密钥核心功能。

span.span: Defines the core functionality for keys that are used with Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类包装 NCrypt 键，而不是 BCrypt 键。This class wraps NCrypt keys, not BCrypt keys. NCrypt 是 CNG 的子集，它提供密钥存储功能。NCrypt is a subset of CNG that provides key storage functionality. BCrypt 是提供基本加密服务的子集，如随机数生成、哈希函数、签名和加密密钥。BCrypt is a subset that provides base cryptographic services such as random number generation, hash functions, signatures, and encryption keys.

An ephemeral key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载将创建一个没有名称的键，这意味着密钥是暂时的 (也就是说，它不会保留) 。This overload creates a key without a name, which means that the key is ephemeral (that is, it will not be persisted). 它还会创建一个默认 对象，该对象指定密钥的默认值 和其他高级参数。It also creates a default object that specifies a default and other advanced parameters for the key.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 此系统上不支持下一代加密技术 (CNG)。

span.span: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
All other errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `keyName` 提供了，此重载将创建一个持久的密钥。If `keyName` is provided, this overload creates a persisted key. 如果 `keyName` 未提供，此密钥将是暂时的。If `keyName` is not provided, the key will be ephemeral. 此重载还会创建一个默认 对象，该对象指定密钥的默认值 和其他高级参数。This overload also creates a default object that specifies a default and other advanced parameters for the key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Delete() cil managed

summary.span: 移除与对象相关联的密钥。

span.span: Removes the key that is associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 当你 对临时密钥调用方法时，它会关闭密钥的句柄。When you call the method on an ephemeral key, it closes the handle to the key. 对 已命名的键调用方法时， 删除命名的键后，就不能再使用该对象。When you call the method on a named key, the object can no longer be used after the named key is deleted.

exception.span: 尝试访问已删除的密钥。

span.span: An attempt was made to access a deleted key.
All other errors.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后 ，必须释放对的所有引用， 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存 。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] Export(class System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyBlobFormat format) cil managed
Public Function Export (format As CngKeyBlobFormat) As Byte()

param.name: format
param.span: 一个指定密钥 BLOB 格式的对象。

span.span: An object that specifies the format of the key BLOB.

summary.span: 将密钥材料以指定的格式导出到 BLOB 中。

span.span: Exports the key material into a BLOB, in the specified format.

returns.span: 一个包含指定格式的密钥材料的 BLOB。

span.span: A BLOB that contains the key material in the specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下一代加密 (CNG) 允许以基础密钥存储提供程序 (KSP) 支持的任何格式导出。Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) allows export in any format that the underlying key storage provider (KSP) supports. 例如，在 Windows Vista 上，默认的 KSP (是 ) 只允许导出 、 和格式的私钥 。For example, on Windows Vista,the default KSP (which is ) only allows export of private keys in the , , and formats. 此限制由基础 KSP 控制。This restriction is controlled by the underlying KSP. 如果使用其他 KSP，可能会应用其他格式。If you use a different KSP, other formats may apply.

span.span: is .
All other errors.

exception.span: 通常情况下， 不允许导出密钥。

span.span: Typically, the does not allow the key to be exported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 导出策略控制密钥的导出频率和格式。The export policy controls the export frequency and format for the key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty GetProperty(string name, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.CngPropertyOptions options) cil managed
Public Function GetProperty (name As String, options As CngPropertyOptions) As CngProperty

span.span: The name of the desired property.

param.name: options
param.span: 指定已命名属性选项的枚举值的按位组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify options for the named property.

summary.span: 在给定名称和一组属性选项的情况下，获取一个属性。

span.span: Gets a property, given a name and a set of property options.

returns.span: 一个包含指定属性的原始值的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the raw value of the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的目的是返回键的任意属性的值。The purpose of this method is to return the value of an arbitrary property of the key. 检索属性的典型方法是使用类提供的属性访问器 。The typical way to retrieve properties is by using the property accessors provided by the class. 为多个（但不是全部）属性提供包装。 provides wrappers for several, but not all, properties. 方法主要用于访问未包装的属性的值。The method is primarily used to access the value of a property that is not wrapped. 此方法在以下情况下很有用：This method is useful in the following cases: - 新版本的操作系统支持下一代加密 (CNG) 密钥属性，不具有包装。A new version of the operating system supports a new Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) key property that does not have a wrapper. - 将自定义属性添加到该密钥。You add a custom property to the key. `options`参数专用于指示以下内容：The `options` parameter is specifically used to indicate the following: - 属性是内置的还是自定义的。Whether the property is built-in, or custom. - 是否应将属性与密钥一起保存。Whether the property should be persisted with the key. 这些选项必须与属性的设置值相匹配，否则将找不到属性。These options must match the value that the property was set with, or the property will not be found. 如果找不到该属性，则会引发。 is thrown if the property cannot be found. 应该 首先调用方法以避免异常，而不是在块中包装方法调用 `try/catch` 。You should call the method first to avoid the exception instead of wrapping the method call in a `try/catch` block.

span.span: is .
All other errors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Handle As SafeNCryptKeyHandle

summary.span: 获取一个表示本机密钥 (NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE) 的安全句柄。

span.span: Gets a safe handle that represents a native key (NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE).

value.span: 一个表示密钥的安全句柄。

span.span: A safe handle that represents the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的句柄是当前对象中的句柄的副本 。The returned handle is a duplicate of the handle in the current object. 即使当前已释放，它也将保留 ，并且必须单独释放。It will persist even if the current is disposed, and must be disposed of separately. 您可以按任何顺序释放当前对象和句柄，而不会产生负面影响。You can release the current object and the handle in any order without any adverse effects.

value.span: 如果密钥是暂时的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the key is ephemeral; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定密钥是否是暂时的 (也就是说，该键仅存在于句柄的生存期) 或持久化 (也就是说，该键独立于句柄) 存在。This property determines whether the key is ephemeral (that is, the key exists only for the lifetime of the handle), or persisted (that is, the key exists independently of the handle). 返回值取决于用于获取密钥的方法：The return value depends on the method that is used to obtain the key: - 如果方法重载未打开该密钥 ，则公共语言运行时 (CLR) 正在管理该密钥，并且可以确定该密钥是否是暂时的。If the key was not opened by the method overload, the common language runtime (CLR) is managing the key and can determine whether it is ephemeral. - 如果键已由 方法重载打开，则 CLR 无法确定它是否是暂时的。If the key was opened by the method overload, the CLR cannot determine whether it is ephemeral. 因此，将假定该密钥是持久的。Therefore, the key is assumed to be persisted. 但是，如果使用此方法打开由 CLR 创建的密钥的句柄，则 CLR 将能够确定它是否是暂时的。However, if this method is used to open a handle to a key that is created by the CLR, the CLR will be able to determine whether it is ephemeral. 此属性没有公共资源库;它是只读的。This property does not have a public setter; it is read-only.

span.span: if the key is available on a machine-wide basis; if the key is only for the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载使用以下默认值：This overload uses the following defaults: - 密钥存储提供程序 (KSP) ： 。Key storage provider (KSP): . 如果要指定其他 KSP，请使用重载。Use the overload if you want to specify another KSP. - 项打开选项： 。Key open options: .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey Open (Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptKeyHandle keyHandle, System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyHandleOpenOptions keyHandleOpenOptions);

span.span: A handle to an existing key.

param.name: keyHandleOpenOptions
param.span: 指示 是否表示暂时密钥或已命名密钥的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether represents an ephemeral key or a named key.

summary.span: 使用现有密钥的句柄创建 对象的一个实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of an object by using a handle to an existing key.
An existing key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使高级用户依赖于平台调用或 c + + 的托管互操作功能，此重载仍可使用 CNG 类。This overload enables advanced users to use the CNG classes even if they rely on platform invoke or the managed interop capability of C++. 例如，如果你有一个以 NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE 方式返回密钥的本机库，则此重载使你可以围绕该密钥创建一个托管包装，并使用 CNG 类对其进行操作。For example, if you have a native library that returns the key as an NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE, this overload lets you create a managed wrapper around the key and use the CNG classes to manipulate it. 使用项的句柄打开密钥时，无法确定密钥的暂时状态，必须自行指定密钥。When you open a key by using its handle, you cannot determine the key's ephemeral state and must specify it yourself. 类的多个属性 依赖于此值是正确的。Several properties of the class rely on this value to be correct. 因此，请确保将正确的标志值传递给 方法。Therefore, make sure that you pass the correct flag value to the methods.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 无效或格式不正确或已经被关闭。

span.span: is invalid or malformed, or it is already closed.

exception.span: 如果密钥是由公共语言运行时 (CLR) 创建的暂时密钥，但未指定 值，也会引发此异常。

span.span: This exception is also thrown if the key is an ephemeral key that is created by the common language runtime (CLR), but the value is not specified.

exception.span: 此系统上不支持下一代加密技术 (CNG)。

span.span: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
All other errors.

span.span: The name of the key.
The KSP that contains the key.

param.name: openOptions
param.span: 枚举值的一个按位组合，这些值指定打开密钥的选项，例如打开密钥的位置（计算机或用户存储）以及是否取消 UI 提示。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify options for opening the key, such as where the key is opened from (machine or user storage) and whether to suppress UI prompting.

summary.span: 使用指定的密钥存储提供程序 (KSP) 和密钥打开选项，创建表示现有已命名密钥的 对象的一个实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of an object that represents an existing named key, using the specified key storage provider (KSP) and key open options.
An existing key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 方法重载不同，此重载使你能够同时指定提供程序和键打开选项。Unlike the method overload, this overload lets you specify both the provider and the key open options.

span.span: or is .

span.span: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
All other errors.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property IntPtr ParentWindowHandle { IntPtr get(); void set(IntPtr value); };
member this.ParentWindowHandle : nativeint with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置窗口句柄 (HWND)，该句柄应该用于由访问密钥而产生的用户界面 (UI) 提示。

span.span: Gets or sets the window handle (HWND) that should be used for user interface (UI) prompts caused by accessing the key.
The parent window handle for the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键的父窗口句柄用于 UI 提示，如智能卡 PIN 提示。The parent window handle for the key is used in UI prompts, such as smart card PIN prompts. 此值不会与持久化密钥一起保存。This value is not persisted with persisted keys. 建议你始终为显示用户界面的键设置此属性。We recommend that you always set this property for keys that display a user interface. 不要将的默认值用于 `null` 此类键。Do not use the default value of `null` for such keys.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Provider As CngProvider

summary.span: 获取托管密钥的密钥存储提供程序 (KSP)。

span.span: Gets the key storage provider (KSP) that manages the key.
The KSP that manages the key.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProviderHandle As SafeNCryptProviderHandle

summary.span: 获取密钥存储提供程序 (KSP) 的一个本机句柄 (NCRYPT_PROV_HANDLE)。

span.span: Gets a native handle (an NCRYPT_PROV_HANDLE) to the key storage provider (KSP).
A handle to the KSP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的句柄是当前对象中的句柄的副本 。The returned handle is a duplicate of the handle in the current object. 即使当前已释放，它也将保留 ，并且必须单独释放。It will persist even if the current is disposed, and must be disposed of separately. 您可以按任何顺序释放当前对象和句柄，而不会产生负面影响。You can release the current object and the handle in any order without any adverse effects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetProperty(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty property) cil managed

span.span: The key property to set.

summary.span: 设置密钥的已命名属性。

span.span: Sets a named property on the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使你可以使用对象向现有的键添加新的自定义属性 。This method enables you to add a new custom property to an existing key by using a object. 对象上设置的选项 必须与调用中的选项完全匹配 。The options set on the object must exactly match the options in the call. 否则，将找不到此属性。Otherwise, the property will not be found.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UIPolicy As CngUIPolicy

summary.span: 获取控制访问密钥时用户界面 (UI) 的参数。

span.span: Gets parameters that control the user interface (UI) for accessing the key.

value.span: 一个包含用于显示 UI 的配置参数的对象。

span.span: An object that contains configuration parameters for displaying the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密钥 UI 策略与 UI 提示（如智能卡 PIN 提示）一起使用。The key UI policy is used with UI prompts such as smart card PIN prompts. 此策略还控制受保护的密钥的密码对话框。This policy also controls password dialog boxes for protected keys.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UniqueName As String
public: property System::String ^ UniqueName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取密钥的唯一名称。

span.span: Gets the unique name for the key.
An alternate name for the key.

value.span: 如果密钥是暂时的，则值为 。

span.span: If the key is ephemeral, the value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取访问密钥时可以使用的备用名称。This property gets an alternate name that can be used when accessing the key. 如果原始密钥名称不能唯一标识持久化密钥，则可以使用此属性。You can use this property if the original key name does not uniquely identify the persisted key. 属性将以此属性的形式返回密钥的文件名。The property will return the file name of the key as this property. 返回的名称 取决于实现。The name returned by the is implementation-dependent.
